amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities And Villages; Laws Applicable To All
amendatorysection.catchline: Musical and amusement organizations; leader; employment.
amendatorysection.para: Every such vocal, instrumental or amusement organization herein contemplated shall be under the instruction and guidance of a leader, who may be nominated in the first instance by the organization or association but whose nomination, term of employment, and compensation shall be subject to the approval of the city council of said city or village board of said village.
